bibl.title: Natural Resources and Cultural Connections of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project III Held in the British Museum, October 2006. (Society for Arabian Studies Monographs. 5 = BAR International Series. 1661.)
bibl.note: 21 communications. - Part I. Natural Resources of the Red Sea. - Part II. The Sea: Boats and Navigation. - Part III. Harbours: Ways of Life and Cultural Connections. - Part IV. The Cultural Connections of the Red Sea. - Pp. 1-6: J.S., P.S. and T.W., Introduction.
bibl.seg: Starkey Janet, Paul Starkey and Tony Wilkinson (Edd.), Natural Resources and Cultural Connections of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project III Held in the British Museum, October 2006. (Society for Arabian Studies Monographs. 5 = BAR International Series. 1661.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2007, 4°, x-261 pp., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 978-1-4073-0097-9. £36.

21 communications. - Part I. Natural Resources of the Red Sea. - Part II. The Sea: Boats and Navigation. - Part III. Harbours: Ways of Life and Cultural Connections. - Part IV. The Cultural Connections of the Red Sea. - Pp. 1-6: J.S., P.S. and T.W., Introduction.
